title: Abua Genesis Portion
description: Abua (Abuan) is a riverine kingdom that is currently located in the Abua–Odual LGA of Rivers State, Nigeria. It is located 10 miles away from Port Harcourt. The main occupation of residents of Abua includes fishing, hunting, and farming.
